name: If you have an Enterprise account, you're given notice before termination

tosdr.tldr: If you have an Enterprise account, you are provided 30 days notice for breach of contract, 10 days for non-payment, and 90 days for all other reasons. Refunds of any unused portions of fees will be provided.
